Uses of Class
pieces.Piece

Packages that use Piece
Package Description
board  
chess  
pieces  

  • Uses of Piece in board

    Fields in board declared as Piece
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Piece[][] Board.board
    board is a 2-d array that will store all pieces.

  • Uses of Piece in chess

    Methods in chess that return Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Piece[][] Chess.copyArray()
    This method makes a copy of the 2D board array to be used for hypothetical tests
    Methods in chess with parameters of type Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean Chess.BlackInCheck​(Piece[][] board)
    This method checks if a Black King is in check in the hypothetical copy board
    static int[] Chess.findKing​(Piece[][] board, boolean team)
    This method find the coordinates of the King piece of specified team on specified board It takes in a boolean of the team type true = white false = black
    static boolean Chess.WhiteInCheck​(Piece[][] board)
    This method checks if a White King is in check in the hypothetical copy board

  • Uses of Piece in pieces

    Subclasses of Piece in pieces
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Bishop
    Bishop is a class that extends the Piece Class.
    class  King
    King is a class that extends the Piece Class.
    class  Knight
    The Knight class extends the Piece class and consists of all the movements and functionality for the Knight The Knight can only move 4 spaces in any direction and in an L shape consisting of 2 spaces vertically and one space horizontally OR 2 spaces horizontally and one space vertically
    class  Pawn
    The Pawn class extends the Piece class and consists of all the moves a Pawn can make The Pawn can move one space vertically unless it is killing
    class  Queen
    The Queen class is an extension of Piece and controls the movement of the Queen The Queen can move in any direction and any number of spaces
    class  Rook
    This class is an extension of the Piece class and controls the functions of the Rook The Rook can move unlimited spaces horizontally and vertically
